about_the_game:
The Matter and Anti-Matter Authority urgently need your help!

Something has happened to all the data and materials in the Elemental Archives!

No scientific knowledge required, on-the-job training will be provided.

We need your unique alchemical skills to rediscover the elements, but beware the dangers a lonesome atom faces!


---

Enter the unique, sub-microscopic world of AlCHeMoS - a single-player Atomic Exploration/Shooter game about alchemy. Take control of a Proto-Atomic Shell to explore weird and wonderful experimental worlds. Search for sub-atomic particles to discover elements. Unleash powerful atomic abilities as you combat the forces of Dark Matter in your quest to master the periodic table and restore balance!

Demo Features:
  • 6 Fully playable levels with protein structure environments built on real scientific experimental data!
  • Flee from or combat Dark Atoms who seek to undergo Fusion with you
  • Fully raymarched environments with beautiful lighting, reflections, shadows and more
  • Dynamic music and sounds that adapt as you progress
  • Challenge your Steam Friends with leaderboards per level

Full Game Features:
  • Fully raymarched environments with beautiful lighting, reflections, shadows and more
  • Dynamic music and sounds that adapt as you progress
  • Discover each of the 118 currently known elements
  • More than 100 real protein structure environments built on real scientific experimental data!
  • Earn quarks to upgrade every aspect of your atom
  • Complete a variety of side objectives to earn powerful unlockable abilities
  • Flee from or combat enemy atoms who seek to undergo Fusion with you

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 4GB of graphics memory is strongly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
